title: Tested items
desc: How many items will be present in one session

title: Step duration
desc: How long should be the delay between two items

title: Item duration
desc: How long should be item displayed

title: Start noise level
desc: How much much noise should be applied on the displayed shape initially.

title: Final noise level
desc: How much much noise should be applied on the shape displayed shape at the end.

title: Shape type
desc: Various shape types: words, numbers, letters... when 'auto_random' is selected, on every session is chosen random shape.
